segments.text: Farmington ? Would you take a look at these catalogue ads that Roger did ? I don ’ t think we can use them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm . I see what you mean . Have you spoken with Roger ? He usually does better work than this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , Mr . Farmington . But , I ’ m not sure that I should bring this up with him . I think it would be better if you spoke to him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Leave these ads with me . I ’ ll speak to him this morning .
segments.speaker: S2
